column1:
Overall Sentiment Over the Years

The overall sentiment percentages in the dataframe show a generally positive trend over the years, with an overall average of 59%. In terms of cleanliness, the average has gone from 50.7% in 2015 to 68.5% in 2023. For amenities, the average has gone from 65.6% in 2015 to 66.2% in 2023, indicating a generally positive but steady trend. Location has also seen a generally positive trend, with an average score of 62.3% in 2015 to 61.0% in 2023. In terms of services, the average score has gone from 58.0% in 2015 to 63.8% in 2023. General feedback has seen a more pronounced increase, with a jump from 66.4% in 2015 to 63.3% in 2023. Lastly, value for money has increased modestly from 62.3% in 2015 to 61.1% in 2023.

Suggestions for Improvement

In terms of cleanliness, the data show that there has been a positive trend in customer sentiment over the years, and should continue to be improved to exceed customer expectations. More attention should be paid to the condition of facilities and surfaces to satisfy customers, and feedback received should be addressed in a timely manner.

In terms of amenities, the data shows a steady but slightly declining trend in sentiment over the years. Customer feedback should be observed closely to ensure that customers are satisfied with the level of amenities provided, and additional amenities should be added where necessary.

The data shows that customer sentiment for location has generally been positive, but with only modest improvement. To ensure that customer satisfaction is maintained, it is important to ensure that the location is easily accessible and convenient for customers.

In terms of services, the data shows an overall positive trend over the years. To ensure customer satisfaction, it is important to maintain customer service standards, and to respond to customer feedback and enquiries in a timely manner.

General feedback has seen the most pronounced improvement over the years, which is a positive sign for the company. To ensure customer satisfaction, it is important to ensure that customer feedback is taken seriously and addressed in a timely manner.

Lastly, the data shows a modest improvement in customers' perception of value for money. To ensure customer satisfaction, it is important to ensure that the prices are competitive, and the quality of the products and services are up to standards.
